Start your day with a glass of water to kickstart your metabolism.
Take the stairs instead of the elevator for some extra steps.
Aim for 7-9 hours of sleep each night for optimal health.
Stand up and stretch every hour if you have a desk job.
Incorporate strength training into your routine at least twice a week.
Eat a variety of colorful fruits and vegetables for a range of nutrients.
Practice deep breathing exercises to reduce stress.
Stay consistent with your fitness routine - small efforts add up over time.
Drink water before meals to help with portion control.
Get outside for some fresh air and sunlight every day.
